##### FILE: deployment.fallback.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/fallback-solution:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: api
  name: fallback-solution
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: api
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: fallback-solution:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 5000
        name: fallback-solution
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 5000

---

##### FILE: deployment.lb.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/sonarqube:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: sona
  name: sonarqube
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 30
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: sona
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: sona
      name: sonarqube
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: liontechacademy/apps:sonarqube-v1.0.1
        name: sonar-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9000

---

##### FILE: deployment.-nginx.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "9113"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf
          name: nginx-config
          subPath: nginx.conf
      - args:
        - --nginx.scrape-uri=http://localhost/metrics
        image: nginx/nginx-prometheus-exporter:1.2.0
        name: nginx-exporter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9113
          name: metrics
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 0.3
            memory: 128Mi
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: nginx-config
        name: nginx-config

---

##### FILE: Deployment.nginx-better.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to 04--deployment/Deployment/nginx-better:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx-better
  name: nginx-better
  namespace: 04--deployment
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-better
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-better
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: cgr.dev/chainguard/nginx:latest
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8080
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 50Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 50Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          privileged: false
      securityContext:
        runAsGroup: 1001
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1001
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource 04--deployment/Deployment/nginx-better

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource 04--deployment/Deployment/nginx-better

1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/sonarqube:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: sona
  name: sonarqube
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 30
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: sona
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: sona
      name: sonarqube
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: liontechacademy/apps:sonarqube-v1.0.1
        name: sonar-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9000

##### FILE: deployment.podinfo.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/podinfo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: podinfo
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 6.5.3
    helm.sh/chart: podinfo-6.5.3
  name: podinfo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: podinfo
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        prometheus.io/port: "9898"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: podinfo
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - ./podinfo
        - --port=9898
        - --cert-path=/data/cert
        - --port-metrics=9797
        - --grpc-port=9999
        - --grpc-service-name=podinfo
        - --level=info
        - --random-delay=false
        - --random-error=false
        env:
        - name: PODINFO_UI_COLOR
          value: '#34577c'
        image: ghcr.io/stefanprodan/podinfo:6.5.3
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - podcli
            - check
            - http
            - localhost:9898/healthz
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 1
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: podinfo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9898
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9797
          name: http-metrics
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9999
          name: grpc
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - podcli
            - check
            - http
            - localhost:9898/readyz
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 1
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits: null
          requests:
            cpu: 1m
            memory: 16Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: data
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: data

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/podinfo

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/podinfo failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/podinfo failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Deployment/podinfo failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/limits/

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/podinfo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: podinfo
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 6.5.3
    helm.sh/chart: podinfo-6.5.3
  name: podinfo
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: podinfo
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        prometheus.io/port: "9898"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: podinfo
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - ./podinfo
        - --port=9898
        - --cert-path=/data/cert
        - --port-metrics=9797
        - --grpc-port=9999
        - --grpc-service-name=podinfo
        - --level=info
        - --random-delay=false
        - --random-error=false
        env:
        - name: PODINFO_UI_COLOR
          value: '#34577c'
        image: ghcr.io/stefanprodan/podinfo:6.5.3
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - podcli
            - check
            - http
            - localhost:9898/healthz
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 1
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: podinfo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9898
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9797
          name: http-metrics
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9999
          name: grpc
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - podcli
            - check
            - http
            - localhost:9898/readyz
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 1
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits: null
          requests:
            cpu: 1m
            memory: 16Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: data
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: data

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/proper-solution:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: api
  name: proper-solution
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: api
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: proper-solution:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 5000
        name: proper-solution
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 5000

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/proper-solution:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: api
  name: proper-solution
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: api
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: proper-solution:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 5000
        name: proper-solution
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 5000

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: sona
  name: sonarqube
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: sona
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: sona
      name: sonarqube
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: liontechacademy/apps:sonarqube-v1.0.1
        name: sonar-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9000

##### FILE: deployment.version-4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/goserver:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: goserver
  name: goserver
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: goserver
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: goserver
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: goserver-env
        - secretRef:
            name: goserver-secret
        image: wesleywillians/hello-go:v5.5
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8000
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: goserver
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8000
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 30
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8000
          periodSeconds: 4
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /go/myfamily
          name: config
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: members
            path: family.txt
          name: configmap-family
        name: config

---

kind: Deployment

  name: synapse
  namespace: synapse

  selector:
    matchLabels:

    type: Recreate

      - args:
        - generate

        - name: SYNAPSE_REPORT_STATS
          value: "yes"
        image: matrixdotorg/synapse:v1.97.0
        name: synapse
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8008
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: data
      volumes:
      - name: data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: synapse-pv-claim

kind: Deployment

  replicas: 2
  template:

      containers:
      - name: assets
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html/assets
          name: efsvolume
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - cp -R /usr/share/nginx/html/assets/* /efsvolume
        image: public.ecr.aws/aws-containers/retail-store-sample-assets:0.4.0
        name: copy
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /efsvolume
          name: efsvolume
      volumes:
      - name: efsvolume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: efs-claim

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: catalog
  namespace: catalog
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: catalog-secret
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: catalog-secret
        name: catalog
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/catalog-secret
          name: catalog-secret
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - csi:
          driver: secrets-store.csi.k8s.io
          readOnly: true
          volumeAttributes:
            secretProviderClass: catalog-spc
        name: catalog-secret

        name: story
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/story
          name: story-volume
      volumes:
      - name: story-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: host-pvc

##### FILE: deployment1019_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/laravel-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: laravel
  name: laravel-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: laravel
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: laravel
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: dbName
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: dbUserNameKey
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: dbPasswordKey
              name: mysql-secret
        image: mysql:8.0
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/www/html/laravel-app/
          name: shared-files
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
          name: nginx-config-volume
          subPath: nginx.conf
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: dbName
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: dbUserNameKey
              name: mysql-secret
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: dbPasswordKey
              name: mysql-secret
        image: quyenvk/laravel-api
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        lifecycle:
          postStart:
            exec:
              command:
              - sh
              - -c
              - |
                mv /var/www/laravel-app/.env.example /var/www/laravel-app/.env; composer install; php artisan key:generate; sed -i "s/DB_DATABASE=laravel/DB_DATABASE=$MYSQL_DATABASE/g" /var/www/laravel-app/.env; sed -i "s/DB_USERNAME=quyenvkbn/DB_USERNAME=$MYSQL_USER/g" /var/www/laravel-app/.env; sed -i "s/DB_PASSWORD=quyenvkbn/DB_PASSWORD=$MYSQL_PASSWORD/g" /var/www/laravel-app/.env; sed -i "s/DB_HOST=127.0.0.1/DB_HOST=laravel/g" /var/www/laravel-app/.env; cp -R /var/www/laravel-app/ /var/www/html/; chown -R www-data:www-data /var/www/html
        name: laravel
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9000
          name: laravel-9000
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: laravel-8000
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/www/html/laravel-app/
          name: shared-files
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pvc-claim
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: shared-files
      - configMap:
          name: nginx-config
        name: nginx-config-volume

---

##### FILE: deployment1026.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to rocketchat/Deployment/jitsi:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: jitsi
  name: jitsi
  namespace: rocketchat
spec:
  progressDeadlineSeconds: 600
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: jitsi
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        k8s-app: jitsi
      name: jitsi
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DOCKER_HOST_ADDRESS
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: JVB_WS_SERVER_ID
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: jitsi-envs
        image: jitsi/web:stable-7882
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: web
        resources: {}
        securityContext:
          privileged: false
        terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
        terminationMessagePolicy: File
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: jitsi-conf
          subPath: web-config
        - mountPath: /var/spool/cron/crontabs
          name: jitsi-conf
          subPath: crontabs
        - mountPath: /usr/share/jitsi-meet/transcripts
          name: jitsi-conf
          subPath: transcripts
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: jitsi-envs
        image: jitsi/prosody:stable-7882
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: prosody
        resources: {}
        securityContext:
          privileged: false
        terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
        terminationMessagePolicy: File
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: jitsi-conf
          subPath: prosody-config
        - mountPath: /prosody-plugins-custom
          name: jitsi-conf
          subPath: prosody-plugins-custom
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: jitsi-envs
        image: jitsi/jicofo:stable-7882
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: jicofo
        resources: {}
        securityContext:
          privileged: false
        terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
        terminationMessagePolicy: File
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: jitsi-conf
          subPath: jicofo-config
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: jitsi-envs
        image: jitsi/jvb:stable-7882
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: jvb
        resources: {}
        securityContext:
          privileged: false
        terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
        terminationMessagePolicy: File
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: jitsi-conf
          subPath: jvb-config
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      restartPolicy: Always
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      securityContext: {}
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30

  namespace: application

      type: frontend

      maxSurge: 5
      maxUnavailable: 5
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: myapp
        run: nginx
        type: frontend

        name: myapp
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 200Mi

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to application/Deployment/myapp:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: myapp
    run: nginx
    type: frontend
  name: myapp
  namespace: application
spec:
  replicas: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: myapp
      run: nginx
      type: frontend
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 2
      maxUnavailable: 2
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: myapp
        run: nginx
        type: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:perl
        name: myapp
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 200Mi

      app: minikube-sample

    metadata:

    spec:

      - env:
        - name: env.namespace
          value: default
        image: minikube-sample:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: minikube-sample
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: config
      volumes:
      - configMap:

        name: config

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/currency-exchange:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: currency-exchange
  name: currency-exchange
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 45
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: currency-exchange
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: currency-exchange
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: doc468991/currency-exchange-devops
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: liveness-port
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: currency-exchange
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: liveness-port
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: liveness-port
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1024Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 512Mi
      restartPolicy: Always
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/external-dns:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: external-dns
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: external-dns
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: external-dns
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --source=service
        - --source=ingress
        - --provider=azure
        image: registry.k8s.io/external-dns/external-dns:v0.14.0
        name: external-dns
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/kubernetes
          name: azure-config-file
          readOnly: true
      serviceAccountName: external-dns
      volumes:
      - name: azure-config-file
        secret:
          secretName: azure-config-file

---

##### FILE: deployment1063.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/currency-exchange:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: currency-exchange
  name: currency-exchange
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 45
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: currency-exchange
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: currency-exchange
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: in28min/currency-exchange-devops
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: liveness-port
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: currency-exchange
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: liveness-port
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: liveness-port
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1024Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 512Mi
      restartPolicy: Always
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: cluster-app
  name: cluster-app-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: cluster-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: cluster-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SECRET_KEY_BASE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: key_base
              name: cluster-app-secret
        - name: PHX_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: phx_host
              name: cluster-app-config-map
        - name: DNS_CLUSTER_QUERY
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: headless_service_dns
              name: cluster-app-config-map
        - name: POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        image: aidanranney/cluster-app:0.1.3
        name: cluster-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 4000
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: myregistrykey

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: grafana
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: grafana
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: grafana
      name: grafana
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: grafana/grafana:latest
        name: grafana
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: grafana
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 500M
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/grafana
          name: grafana-storage
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/provisioning/datasources
          name: grafana-datasources
          readOnly: false
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: grafana-storage
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: grafana-datasources
        name: grafana-datasources

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: exporter
    app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 2.12.0
  name: kube-state-metrics
  namespace: kube-system

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: exporter
        app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 2.12.0
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      containers:
      - image: registry.k8s.io/kube-state-metrics/kube-state-metrics:v2.12.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: kube-state-metrics
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http-metrics
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: telemetry
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 65534
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: kube-state-metrics

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to md2pdf/Deployment/api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: api
  namespace: md2pdf
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: api
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: db-config
        - configMapRef:
            name: queue-config
        - configMapRef:
            name: api-config
        image: api-service:latest
        name: service
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/blob-storage
          name: blob-storage
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - /scripts/set-permissions.sh
        - /data
        image: alpine:latest
        name: blob-storage-permissions
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: blob-storage
        - mountPath: /scripts
          name: blob-storage-permissions
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: db-config
        image: api-db-migration:latest
        name: db-migration
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
      volumes:
      - name: blob-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: blob-storage-disk-claim
      - configMap:
          mode: 484
          name: blob-storage-disk-permissions
        name: blob-storage-permissions

---

##### FILE: deployment1083.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to md2pdf/StatefulSet/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    app: mongodb
  name: mongodb
  namespace: md2pdf
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --dbpath
        - /data/db
        env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongo-creds
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongo-creds
        image: mongo:7.0
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - mongosh
            - --eval
            - db.adminCommand('ping')
          failureThreshold: 6
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: mongodb
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - mongosh
            - --eval
            - db.adminCommand('ping')
          failureThreshold: 6
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-data-dir
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-data-dir
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongodb-volume-claim

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource md2pdf/StatefulSet/mongodb

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource md2pdf/StatefulSet/mongodb
policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource md2pdf/StatefulSet/mongodb failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource md2pdf/StatefulSet/mongodb failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

##### FILE: deployment109.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/ghost:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: ghost
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ghost
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: ghost
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: database__connection__user
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: ghost-db
        - name: database__connection__password
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: ghost-db
        image: ghost:5.113
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: X-Forwarded-Proto
              value: https
            path: /
            port: 2368
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: ghost
        ports:
        - containerPort: 2368
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders:
            - name: X-Forwarded-Proto
              value: https
            path: /
            port: 2368
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1024m
            memory: 1024Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/ghost/content
          name: media
        - mountPath: /var/lib/ghost/config.production.json
          name: config
          subPath: config.production.json
      volumes:
      - name: media
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: media-pvc
          readOnly: false
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: config.production.json
            path: config.production.json
          name: ghost-conf
        name: config

---

          protocol: TCP

##### FILE: deployment1093.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/homepage:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: homepage
    try: "1"
  name: homepage
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: homepage
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: homepage
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: homepage-env-configmap
        image: ghcr.io/gethomepage/homepage:v0.10.9
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: homepage
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          runAsNonRoot: true
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/config/custom.js
          name: homepage-config
          subPath: custom.js
        - mountPath: /app/config/custom.css
          name: homepage-config
          subPath: custom.css
        - mountPath: /app/config/bookmarks.yaml
          name: homepage-config
          subPath: bookmarks.yaml
        - mountPath: /app/config/docker.yaml
          name: homepage-config
          subPath: docker.yaml
        - mountPath: /app/config/kubernetes.yaml
          name: homepage-config
          subPath: kubernetes.yaml
        - mountPath: /app/config/services.yaml
          name: homepage-config
          subPath: services.yaml
        - mountPath: /app/config/settings.yaml
          name: homepage-config
          subPath: settings.yaml
        - mountPath: /app/config/widgets.yaml
          name: homepage-config
          subPath: widgets.yaml
        - mountPath: /app/config/logs
          name: logs
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      enableServiceLinks: true
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
        runAsGroup: 1000
        runAsUser: 1000
      serviceAccountName: homepage
      volumes:
      - name: homepage-config
        secret:
          secretName: homepage-config
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: logs

---

##### FILE: deployment110.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to changedetection-io/Deployment/changedetection-io:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: changedetection-io
  namespace: changedetection-io
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: changedetection-io
      app.kubernetes.io/name: changedetection-io
      pod.name: main
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: changedetection-io

        - -c
        - /etc/init.d/selinon.sh
        env:
        - name: DATABASE_NAME
          value: postgres
        - name: POSTGRES_HOST
          value: notarydev.default
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          value: postgres
        - name: POSTGRES_NAME
          value: postgres
        - name: POSTGRES_PORT
          value: "5432"
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          value: O5xjQMxPgpj4LxE3aRfqHaFRqR6RsZ3efebYVbCEIL1bLS8CRt5SCSNVgrc7NvbU
        - name: CELERY_BROKER_URL
          value: amqp://mquser:mqpass@rabbitmq-notary-0.rabbitmq-notary-headless.notary-dev.svc.cluster.local:5672/
        - name: RESULT_BACKEND_URL
          value: redis://default:redis@redis-selinon-master.default.svc.cluster.local:6379/0
        - name: REDISIP
          value: redis-selinon-master.default.svc.cluster.local
        - name: REDIS_PASSWORD
          value: redis

          value: "1"

          value: notary-dev

          value: bluemintminio

          value: minio.gcp.bluemint.ai
        - name: MINIO_CLIENT_HOST
          value: minio.gcp.bluemint.ai
        - name: LOCAL_DRIVE
          value: "false"
        - name: TZ
          value: Asia/Beirut

        name: myapp-container
      tolerations:

        key: special
        operator: Equal
        value: "false"

##### FILE: deployment11012.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to apps/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx-deployment
    fruta: banana
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: apps
spec:
  replicas: 10
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-deployment
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 2
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.14.0
        name: nginx
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 0.7
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 0.4
            memory: 64Mi

---

##### FILE: deployment11013.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/kube101:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: kube101
  name: kube101
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: kube101
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: kube101
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: kube101-secret
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        image: nikolaies/kube101:v4
        name: kube101
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /root/files/custom.config
          name: file-volume
          readOnly: true
          subPath: custom.config
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: custom.config
            path: custom.config
          name: kube101-cm
        name: file-volume

---

      app: myapp

##### FILE: deployment111.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/cloudprober:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: cloudprober
  name: cloudprober
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: cloudprober
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "9313"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: cloudprober
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config_file
        - /config/cloudprober.cfg
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: cf-access-keys
        image: cloudprober/cloudprober:v0.13.9
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /status
            port: metrics
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 3
        name: cloudprober
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9313
          name: metrics
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /status
            port: metrics
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 3
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 256Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsGroup: 65534
          runAsUser: 65534
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: config
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: cloudprober-config
        name: config

---

  name: kube-state-metrics
  namespace: kube-system

      app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
  template:

      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.9.7
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: quay.io/coreos/kube-state-metrics:v1.9.7
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: kube-state-metrics
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http-metrics
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: telemetry
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        securityContext:
          runAsUser: 65534
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: kube-state-metrics

  namespace: monitoring

      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1

  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:

    spec:
      containers:
      - image: grafana/grafana
        name: grafana
        ports:

          protocol: TCP

            cpu: 500m
            memory: 2500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/grafana
          name: data
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: data

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: prometheus-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config.file=/etc/prometheus/prometheus.yaml
        - --storage.tsdb.path=/prometheus/
        image: prom/prometheus
        name: prometheus
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9090
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/prometheus/
          name: prometheus-config-volume
        - mountPath: /prometheus/
          name: prometheus-storage-volume
      serviceAccountName: prometheus-server
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: prometheus-configuration
        name: prometheus-config-volume
      - name: prometheus-storage-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: prompvc

---

    cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer: kubeissuer
    kubernetes.io/ingress.class: nginx
  name: kube-certs-ingress
  namespace: demo

  rules:
  - host: hello.devopstech.fun
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: kube-certs
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - hello.devopstech.fun
    secretName: demo

##### FILE: deployment112_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/grafana:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: grafana
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: grafana
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: grafana
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: GF_LOG_LEVEL
          value: DEBUG
        - name: GF_LOG_MODE
          value: console
        - name: GF_SERVER_HTTP_PORT
          value: "3000"
        - name: GF_PATHS_CONFIG
          value: /local/grafana.ini
        - name: GF_PATHS_PROVISIONING
          value: /local/grafana/provisioning
        image: grafana/grafana:11.5.2
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 3000
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: grafana
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 3000
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1024Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /local/grafana.ini
          name: grafana-config
          subPath: grafana.ini
        - mountPath: /var/lib/grafana
          name: grafana-storage-volume
        - mountPath: /local/grafana/provisioning/datasources/datasources.yaml
          name: grafana-datasources
          subPath: datasources.yaml
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chown 472:0 /data
        image: busybox:1.37
        name: volume-permissions
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: grafana-storage-volume
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: grafana-config
        name: grafana-config
      - name: grafana-storage-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: grafana
      - configMap:
          name: grafana-datasources
        name: grafana-datasources

---

##### FILE: deployment113.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Deployment/kube-state-metrics:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: exporter
    app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 2.10.0
  name: kube-state-metrics
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: exporter
        app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 2.10.0
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      containers:
      - image: registry.k8s.io/kube-state-metrics/kube-state-metrics:v2.15.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: kube-state-metrics
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http-metrics
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: telemetry
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 65534
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: kube-state-metrics

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: echo-server-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: echo-server
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: echo-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: CUSTOM_MESSAGE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: customMessage
              name: echo-server-config
        image: echo-server:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: echo-server-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/foo
          name: foo
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: echo-server-config
        name: foo

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to n8n/Deployment/n8n-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: n8n
    component: deployment
  name: n8n-deployment
  namespace: n8n
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: n8n
      component: deployment
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: n8n
        component: deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - sleep 5; n8n start
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        env:
        - name: N8N_SMTP_HOST
          value: email-smtp.us-west-2.amazonaws.com
        - name: N8N_SMTP_PORT
          value: "587"
        - name: N8N_SMTP_USER
          value: AKIAJ6SLTZFOHHZSTUKQ
        - name: N8N_SMTP_PASS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: smtp
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: n8n-configmap
        image: n8nio/n8n:1.84.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /metrics
            port: 5678
        name: n8n
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5678
          name: http
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /metrics
            port: 5678
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1.0"
            memory: 1024Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 512Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /home/node/.n8n/
          name: storage
      dnsConfig:
        nameservers:
        - 1.1.1.1
        - 1.0.0.1
      dnsPolicy: None
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chown 1000:1000 /data
        image: busybox:1.37
        name: volume-permissions
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: storage
      volumes:
      - name: storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: n8n-storage

---

##### FILE: deployment115.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/relay:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: relay
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: relay
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: relay
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SMTP_PORT
          value: "587"
        - name: SMTP_SERVER
          value: email-smtp.us-west-2.amazonaws.com
        - name: SMTP_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: smtp
        - name: SMTP_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: smtp
        - name: SERVER_HOSTNAME
          value: whitestar.systems
        - name: SMTP_NETWORKS
          value: 0.0.0.0/0
        image: juanluisbaptiste/postfix:1.7.1
        livenessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          tcpSocket:
            port: 25
        name: relay
        ports:
        - containerPort: 25
        readinessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          tcpSocket:
            port: 25
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 256m
            memory: 128Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
          runAsGroup: 0
          runAsUser: 0

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/gogs-web:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: gogs-web
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: gogs-web
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: gogs-web
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SOCAT_LINK
          value: "false"
        image: gogs/gogs:0.13
        name: gogs
        ports:
        - containerPort: 22
          name: ssh
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: http
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: gogs
      volumes:
      - name: gogs
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: gogs-claim

##### FILE: deployment1161.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/homepage-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: homepage-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: homepage
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: homepage
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: web-container
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 300m
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: config-volume
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - apk add --no-cache curl && while true; do echo "Checking health status...";
          curl -sS http://homepage-service:80/health-check.html; sleep 60; done
        image: alpine:latest
        name: monitoring-sidecar
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 300m
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /logs
          name: log-volume
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: homepage-configmap
        name: config-volume
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: log-volume

---

##### FILE: Deployment1163.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-grayscale/Deployment/kube-flow-demo:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    deployment.kubernetes.io/revision: "5"
    kubernetes.io/change-cause: update YAML
  labels:
    app: kube-flow-demo
    dce.daocloud.io/app: kube-flow-demo
  name: kube-flow-demo
  namespace: kube-grayscale
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: kube-flow-demo
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        dce.daocloud.io/parcel.egress.burst: "0"
        dce.daocloud.io/parcel.egress.rate: "0"
        dce.daocloud.io/parcel.ingress.burst: "0"
        dce.daocloud.io/parcel.ingress.rate: "0"
        dce.daocloud.io/parcel.net.value: default-ipv4-ippool
      labels:
        app: kube-flow-demo
        dce.daocloud.io/app: kube-flow-demo
        dce.daocloud.io/component: kube-flow-demo
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - ./main
        - -v
        - flow
        image: kamalyes/kube-grayscale-release:flow
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: kube-flow-demo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: "314572800"
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: "314572800"

---

        dce.daocloud.io/parcel.egress.rate: "0"
        dce.daocloud.io/parcel.ingress.burst: "0"
        dce.daocloud.io/parcel.ingress.rate: "0"
        dce.daocloud.io/parcel.net.value: default-ipv4-ippool
      labels:
        app: kube-weight-demo
        dce.daocloud.io/app: kube-weight-demo
        dce.daocloud.io/component: kube-weight-demo
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - ./main
        - -v
        - weight
        image: kamalyes/kube-grayscale-release:weight
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: kube-weight-demo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: "314572800"
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: "314572800"

---

    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: eric-see
    app.kubernetes.io/type: app
  name: helloworld
  namespace: ms-layer

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: service
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: helloworld
      app.kubernetes.io/name: helloworld
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: service
        app.kubernetes.io/created-by: eric-see
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: helloworld
        app.kubernetes.io/name: helloworld
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: helloworld
        image: ksericpro/backend:2.1.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 3
        name: helloworld
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8080
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 3
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 512Mi

##### FILE: deployment1175.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ms-layer/Deployment/notification-ms:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: eric-see
    app.kubernetes.io/type: app
  name: notification-ms
  namespace: ms-layer
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: service
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: notification-ms
      app.kubernetes.io/name: notification-ms
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: service
        app.kubernetes.io/created-by: eric-see
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: notification-ms
        app.kubernetes.io/name: notification-ms
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: AMQP_URL
          value: amqp://guest:guest@rabbitmq.common-utils.svc.cluster.local:5672
        - name: DB_DATABASE
          value: event-driven_db
        - name: DB_HOST
          value: postgres.common-utils.svc.cluster.local
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          value: S3cret
        - name: DB_USER
          value: event-driven-user
        - name: QUEUE
          value: event_driven
        image: ksericpro/notification-ms:2.0.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8001
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 3
        name: notification-ms
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8001
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8001
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 3
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 512Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/src
          name: notification-ms-claim0
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: notification-ms-claim0
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: notification-ms-claim0

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: eric-see
    app.kubernetes.io/type: app
  name: user-ms
  namespace: ms-layer
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: user-ms
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: user-ms
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: AMQP_URL
          value: amqp://guest:guest@rabbitmq.common-utils.svc.cluster.local:5672
        - name: QUEUE
          value: event_driven
        image: ksericpro/user-ms:2.0.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: user-ms
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 512Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/src
          name: user-ms-claim0
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: user-ms-claim0
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: user-ms-claim0

  namespace: default

  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: html
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: index2.html
            path: k8s/index2.html
          - key: index.html
            path: k8s/index.html

##### FILE: deployment1187.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ghost/Deployment/ghost:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: ghost
  name: ghost
  namespace: ghost
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ghost
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: ghost
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: database__connection__database
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: db-name
              name: mysql-secrets
              optional: false
        - name: database__connection__user
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: db-user
              name: mysql-secrets
              optional: false
        - name: database__connection__password
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: db-pass
              name: mysql-secrets
              optional: false
        - name: mail__options__auth__user
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mailgun_username
              name: ghost-secrets
              optional: false
        - name: mail__options__auth__pass
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mailgun_password
              name: ghost-secrets
              optional: false
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: ghost-configmap
        image: ghost:alpine
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 30
          tcpSocket:
            port: ghost
        name: ghost
        ports:
        - containerPort: 2368
          name: ghost
        readinessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          tcpSocket:
            port: ghost
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 350m
            memory: 300Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 180Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/ghost/content
          name: ghost-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: ghost-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: ghost

---

##### FILE: deployment1188.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ghost/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysql
  name: mysql
  namespace: ghost
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
      tier: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
        tier: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: db-pass
              name: mysql-secrets
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: db-name
              name: mysql-secrets
        image: mysql:8.0.33
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 30
          tcpSocket:
            port: mysql
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        readinessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          tcpSocket:
            port: mysql
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 400m
            memory: 550Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 450Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql

---

          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:

          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace

        name: backend
        ports:

      serviceAccountName: backend-weighted

  revisionHistoryLimit: 5

    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: http-dump
      app.kubernetes.io/name: http-dump
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations: null
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: http-dump
        app.kubernetes.io/name: http-dump
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: false
      containers:
      - image: nomadscafe.sakuracr.jp/http-dump-request
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /nogzip/live
            port: http
        name: http-dump
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /nogzip/live
            port: http
        resources: {}
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
          runAsGroup: 10000
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 10000
          seLinuxOptions:
            level: s0:c123,c456
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 10000
        fsGroupChangePolicy: OnRootMismatch
        runAsGroup: 10000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 10000
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
        supplementalGroups: []
        sysctls: []

    app.kubernetes.io/name: maester

  namespace: default

      app.kubernetes.io/instance: oathkeeper
      app.kubernetes.io/name: oathkeeper-maester

        app.kubernetes.io/instance: oathkeeper
        app.kubernetes.io/name: oathkeeper-maester
        control-plane: controller-manager

      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      containers:

        - --metrics-addr=0.0.0.0:8080
        - controller
        - --rulesConfigmapName=oathkeeper-rules
        - --rulesConfigmapNamespace=ory

        - /manager

        name: maester

          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true

          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 65534
          seLinuxOptions:
            level: s0:c123,c456
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
        terminationMessagePolicy: File

      nodeSelector: null
      restartPolicy: Always
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 65534
        fsGroupChangePolicy: OnRootMismatch
        runAsGroup: 65534
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 65534
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
        supplementalGroups: []
        sysctls: []

      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    deployment: hello
  name: the-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      deployment: hello
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        deployment: hello
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /hello
        - --port=8080
        - --enableRiskyFeature=$(ENABLE_RISKY)
        env:
        - name: ALT_GREETING
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: altGreeting
              name: the-map
        - name: ENABLE_RISKY
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: enableRisky
              name: the-map
        image: monopole/hello:1
        name: the-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

##### FILE: deployment1216.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/goserver:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: goserver
  name: goserver
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: goserver
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: goserver
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: goserver-env
        - secretRef:
            name: goserver-secret
        image: wesleywillians/hello-go:v9.6
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8000
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: goserver
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8000
          periodSeconds: 3
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.05"
            memory: 25Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.05"
            memory: 20Mi
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 30
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8000
          periodSeconds: 3
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /go/myfamily
          name: config
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /go/pvc
          name: goserver-volume
      volumes:
      - name: goserver-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: goserver-pvc
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: members
            path: family.txt
          name: configmap-family
        name: config

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/goserver

1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/goserver failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/goserver failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

##### FILE: deployment1221.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/goserver:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: goserver
  name: goserver
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: goserver
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: goserver
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: goserver-env
        - secretRef:
            name: goserver-secret
        image: wtrcx/5_kubernetes_iniciando:v7
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: goserver
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
          periodSeconds: 3
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 25Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 1m
            memory: 1Mi
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 30
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
          periodSeconds: 3
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /go/src/app/myfamily
          name: config
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /go/pvc
          name: goserver-volume
      volumes:
      - name: goserver-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: goserver-pvc
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: members
            path: family.txt
          name: goserver-family-env
        name: config

---

##### FILE: deployment1224.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: mysql
        image: mysql:8.0
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app/name: hello-world
  name: hello-world
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app/name: hello-world
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app/name: hello-world
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: gcr.io/google-samples/node-hello:1.0
        name: hello-world
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 64Mi

##### FILE: deployment1229.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/hello-world:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app/name: hello-world
  name: hello-world
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app/name: hello-world
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        vault.hashicorp.com/agent-inject: "true"
        vault.hashicorp.com/agent-inject-secret-app: secret/data/hello-world
        vault.hashicorp.com/auth-path: auth/kubernetes
        vault.hashicorp.com/log-level: trace
        vault.hashicorp.com/role: hello-world-app
      labels:
        app/name: hello-world
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: gcr.io/google-samples/node-hello:1.0
        name: hello-world
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 64Mi
      serviceAccountName: hello-world

---
