##### FILE: deployment1261.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kubernetes-101/Deployment/golang-api-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: golang-api
    environment: production
  name: golang-api-deployment
  namespace: kubernetes-101
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: golang-api
      environment: production
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: golang-api
        environment: production
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MESSAGE
          value: hello world
        - name: SECRET_CONFIG
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: .env
              name: secret-config
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: config
        image: adiatma/golang-api
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: http-golang-api
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        name: golang-api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: http-golang-api
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 54Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 54Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /volume
          name: empty-volume
        - mountPath: /secret
          name: secret-config
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /config
          name: config
          readOnly: true
      hostname: golang-api
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - date; echo hello world
        image: busybox:1.28
        name: init-db
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: empty-volume
      - name: secret-config
        secret:
          secretName: secret-config
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: config.yaml
            path: config.yaml
          name: config
        name: config

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource kubernetes-101/Deployment/golang-api-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource kubernetes-101/Deployment/golang-api-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource kubernetes-101/Deployment/golang-api-deployment failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

##### FILE: deployment1262.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Deployment/kube-state-metrics:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: exporter
    app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 2.3.0
  name: kube-state-metrics
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: exporter
        app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 2.3.0
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      containers:
      - image: k8s.gcr.io/kube-state-metrics/kube-state-metrics:v2.3.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: kube-state-metrics
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http-metrics
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: telemetry
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsUser: 65534
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: kube-state-metrics

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: deployment1263.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Deployment/prometheus-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: prometheus-server
  name: prometheus-deployment
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: prometheus-server
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: prometheus-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --storage.tsdb.retention.time=12h
        - --config.file=/etc/prometheus/prometheus.yml
        - --storage.tsdb.path=/prometheus/
        image: prom/prometheus
        name: prometheus
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9090
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 500M
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/prometheus/
          name: prometheus-config-volume
        - mountPath: /prometheus/
          name: prometheus-storage-volume
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: prometheus-server-conf
        name: prometheus-config-volume
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: prometheus-storage-volume

---

##### FILE: deployment1267.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Deployment/prometheus-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: prometheus-server
  name: prometheus-deployment
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: prometheus-server
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: prometheus-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --storage.tsdb.retention.time=12h
        - --config.file=/etc/prometheus/prometheus.yml
        - --storage.tsdb.path=/prometheus/
        image: prom/prometheus
        name: prometheus
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9090
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 500M
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/prometheus/
          name: prometheus-config-volume
        - mountPath: /prometheus/
          name: prometheus-storage-volume
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: prometheus-server-conf
        name: prometheus-config-volume
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: prometheus-storage-volume

---

      maxUnavailable: 1

      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: grafana/grafana
        name: grafana

            cpu: 500m
            memory: 2500Mi

            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/grafana
          name: data
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: data

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/prometheus-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: prometheus-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config.file=/etc/prometheus/prometheus.yaml
        - --storage.tsdb.path=/prometheus/

        - containerPort: 9090

          name: prometheus-config-volume

        - containerPort: 7443
          name: main
        - containerPort: 3070
          name: additional
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 6000m
            memory: 8Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 4000m
            memory: 4Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/sourcegraph
          name: nfs-mount
          subPath: config
        - mountPath: /var/opt/sourcegraph
          name: nfs-mount
          subPath: data
      volumes:
      - name: nfs-mount
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: pvc-nfs-gitlab-sourcegraph
      - name: ssh-key
        secret:
          secretName: tls-devops-example-com

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/vizier-operator:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: vizier-operator
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: vizier-operator
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: vizier-operator
        plane: control
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: Exists
              - key: kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: beta.kubernetes.io/os
                operator: Exists
              - key: beta.kubernetes.io/os
                operator: In
                values:
                - linux
      containers:
      - image: operator-operator_image:latest
        name: app
      serviceAccountName: pixie-operator-service-account

##### FILE: deployment13.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/external-dns:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: external-dns
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: external-dns
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: external-dns
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --source=ingress
        - --domain-filter=piny940.com
        - --provider=cloudflaretunnel
        - --txt-owner-id=$(OWNER_ID)
        env:
        - name: OWNER_ID
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: OWNER_ID
              name: external-dns-conf
        - name: CF_API_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: cloudflare-token
              name: external-dns-secret
        - name: CF_TUNNEL_ID
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: CF_TUNNEL_ID
              name: external-dns-conf
        - name: CF_ACCOUNT_ID
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: CF_ACCOUNT_ID
              name: external-dns-conf
        - name: SLACK_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: slack-token
              name: external-dns-secret
        - name: SLACK_CHANNEL
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: SLACK_CHANNEL
              name: external-dns-conf
        image: external-dns
        name: external-dns
      serviceAccountName: external-dns

---

##### FILE: deployment130.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/unused:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: unused
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: kubernetes.io/arch
        operator: Equal
        value: amd64
      - effect: NoExecute
        key: kubernetes.io/arch
        operator: Equal
        value: amd64
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: kubernetes.io/arch
        operator: Equal
        value: arm64
      - effect: NoExecute
        key: kubernetes.io/arch
        operator: Equal
        value: arm64

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: root
        image: mysql:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /docker-entrypoint-initdb.d
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: pvc

---

        - name: REGION
          value: northpole

        - secretRef:
            name: secretdata
        image: jlnhnng/christmas-special:latest
        name: toy-manufacturing
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/secret
          name: secret-volume

          secretName: secretdata

kind: Deployment

  name: slackin-server
  namespace: default

  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: slackin-server
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: slackin-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: RECAPTCHA_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: RECAPTCHA_SECRET
              name: slackin-secrets
        - name: SLACK_API_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: SLACK_API_TOKEN
              name: slackin-secrets
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: slackin-config
        image: ghcr.io/pixie-io/slackin:0.1.0@sha256:6811d908c353b4bacb3108d853e60e7b98149a7f6e71c110c2d212e58632271b
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 58000
            scheme: HTTP
        name: slackin-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 58000
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 58000
            scheme: HTTP

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: website-carrito
  name: website-carrito
  namespace: desafio-16-17
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: website-carrito
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: website-carrito
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: alanclausel/kubernetes:1
        name: website
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

##### FILE: deployment1316.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to devops-tools/Deployment/jenkins:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: jenkins
  namespace: devops-tools
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: jenkins-server
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: jenkins-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: jenkins/jenkins:lts
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /login
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 90
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: jenkins
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: httpport
        - containerPort: 50000
          name: jnlpport
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /login
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 2Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 500Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/jenkins_home
          name: jenkins-data
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
        runAsUser: 1000
      serviceAccountName: jenkins-admin
      volumes:
      - name: jenkins-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: jenkins-pv-claim

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/auth:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: auth
  name: auth
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: auth
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 3
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: auth
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: auth-configmap
        - secretRef:
            name: auth-secret
        image: tcsharath6497/auth
        name: auth
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/currency-exchange:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: currency-exchange
  name: currency-exchange
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 45
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: currency-exchange
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: currency-exchange
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: in28min/currency-exchange-devops
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: liveness-port
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: currency-exchange
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: liveness-port
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: liveness-port
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1024Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 512Mi
      restartPolicy: Always
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30

---

##### FILE: deployment1357.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to langchain/Deployment/basic-chain-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: basic-chain-server
  name: basic-chain-server
  namespace: langchain
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: basic-chain-server
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: basic-chain-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MODEL
          value: /models/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.2.Q4_K_M.gguf
        - name: N_GPU_LAYERS
          value: "0"
        - name: N_CTX
          value: "1024"
        - name: N_BATCH
          value: "1024"
        image: gclef/langchain:0.1-basic
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: basic-chain-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: basicchainport
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 5Gi
          requests:
            memory: 4Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /models
          name: models
      volumes:
      - name: models
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: langchain-pvc

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to langchain/Deployment/ddg-qa-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: ddg-qa-server
  name: ddg-qa-server
  namespace: langchain
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ddg-qa-server
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: ddg-qa-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MODEL
          value: /models/mistral-7b-instruct-v0.2.Q4_K_M.gguf
        - name: N_GPU_LAYERS
          value: "0"
        - name: N_CTX
          value: "4096"
        - name: N_BATCH
          value: "1024"
        - name: VECTOR_STORAGE_PATH
          value: /scratch
        image: gclef/langchain:0.11-ddgqa
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: dda-qa-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: ddgqaport
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "3"
            memory: 6Gi
          requests:
            cpu: "2"
            memory: 4Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /models
          name: models
        - mountPath: /scratch
          name: scratchspace
      volumes:
      - name: models
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: langchain-pvc
      - emptyDir: null
        name: scratchspace

---

kind: Deployment

  name: unused
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: kubernetes.io/arch
        operator: Equal
        value: amd64
      - effect: NoExecute
        key: kubernetes.io/arch
        operator: Equal
        value: amd64

    app.kubernetes.io/version: ce-latest-ee-2.19.4
    io.portainer.kubernetes.application.stack: portainer
  name: portainer
  namespace: portainer
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: portainer
      app.kubernetes.io/name: portainer
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: portainer
        app.kubernetes.io/name: portainer
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --tunnel-port=30776
        image: portainer/portainer-ce:2.19.4
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 9443
            scheme: HTTPS
        name: portainer
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9000
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: tcp-edge
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 9443
            scheme: HTTPS
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: data
      nodeSelector: {}
      serviceAccountName: portainer-sa-clusteradmin
      volumes:
      - name: data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: portainer

##### FILE: Deployment138.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Deployment/alertmanager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: alertmanager
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: alertmanager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: alertmanager
      name: alertmanager
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config.file=/etc/alertmanager/config.yml
        - --storage.path=/alertmanager
        image: prom/alertmanager:latest
        name: alertmanager
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9093
          name: alertmanager
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 500M
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/alertmanager
          name: config-volume
        - mountPath: /etc/alertmanager-templates
          name: templates-volume
        - mountPath: /alertmanager
          name: alertmanager
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: alertmanager-config
        name: config-volume
      - configMap:
          name: alertmanager-templates
        name: templates-volume
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: alertmanager

---

##### FILE: deployment1391.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to flux-system/Deployment/kustomize-mutating-webhook:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: kustomize-mutating-webhook
  name: kustomize-mutating-webhook
  namespace: flux-system
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: kustomize-mutating-webhook
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: kustomize-mutating-webhook
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: LOG_LEVEL
          value: info
        - name: RATE_LIMIT
          value: "100"
        image: ghcr.io/xunholy/kustomize-mutating-webhook:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8443
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: webhook
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ready
            port: 8443
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsGroup: 1000
          runAsUser: 1000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/webhook/certs
          name: webhook-certs
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/config
          name: cluster-config
          readOnly: true
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: kustomize-mutating-webhook
      volumes:
      - name: webhook-certs
        secret:
          secretName: kustomize-mutating-webhook-tls
      - configMap:
          name: cluster-config
        name: cluster-config

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: flux-target-updater
  name: flux-target-updater
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flux-target-updater
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: flux-target-updater
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: flux-target-updater-conf
        - secretRef:
            name: flux-target-updater-secret
        image: flux-target-updater
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
      serviceAccountName: flux-target-updater

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to immich/Deployment/immich:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: immich
  namespace: immich
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: immich
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "8081"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: immich
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - '[ -d "/usr/src/app/upload/library" ] && ./start.sh || echo "Missing library
          folder in immich data"'
        env:
        - name: DB_HOSTNAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_HOSTNAME
              name: immich-config
        - name: DB_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_PORT
              name: immich-config
        - name: DB_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_USERNAME
              name: immich-config
        - name: DB_DATABASE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_DATABASE_NAME
              name: immich-config
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DB_PASSWORD
              name: immich-secret
        - name: REDIS_HOSTNAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: REDIS_HOSTNAME
              name: immich-config
        - name: REDIS_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: REDIS_PORT
              name: immich-config
        - name: IMMICH_METRICS
          value: "true"
        - name: IMMICH_PORT
          value: "3001"
        image: ghcr.io/immich-app/immich-server:v1.106.4
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: immich
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3001
          name: http-port
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: server-metrics
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/src/app/upload
          name: immich-data
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/hostname: bunetzk8s
      volumes:
      - name: immich-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: immich-data-pvc

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to loki/Deployment/loki:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: loki
  namespace: loki
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: loki
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "3100"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: loki
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -config.file=/etc/loki/config.yaml
        image: grafana/loki:3.0.0
        name: loki
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3100
          name: http-port
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/loki
          name: loki-config
        - mountPath: /var/loki/chunks
          name: loki-chunks-data
        - mountPath: /var/loki/rules
          name: loki-rules-data
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/hostname: bunetzk8s-agent
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: loki-config
        name: loki-config
      - name: loki-chunks-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: loki-chunks-pvc
      - name: loki-rules-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: loki-rules-pvc

---

kind: Deployment

  name: pihole
  namespace: pihole
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: pihole
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: pihole
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TZ
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: TZ
              name: pihole-config
        - name: WEBPASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: WEBPASSWORD
              name: pihole-secret
        - name: WEB_PORT
          value: "30234"
        image: pihole/pihole:2024.05.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: pihole
        ports:
        - containerPort: 53
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 53
          protocol: UDP
        - containerPort: 67
          protocol: UDP
        - containerPort: 547
          protocol: UDP
        - containerPort: 30234
          name: http-port
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 4711
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 300m
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 128Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/pihole
          name: pihole-data
          subPath: ./data/pihole
        - mountPath: /etc/dnsmasq.d
          name: pihole-data
          subPath: ./data/dnsmasq.d
      hostNetwork: true
      volumes:
      - name: pihole-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: pihole-pv-claim

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mealie:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mealie
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: mealie
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: mealie
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ALLOW_SIGNUP
          value: "false"
        - name: PUID
          value: "1000"
        - name: PGID
          value: "1337"
        - name: TZ
          value: Asia/Kathmandu
        - name: MAX_WORKERS
          value: "1"
        - name: WEB_CONCURRENCY
          value: "1"
        - name: BASE_URL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: BASE_URL
              name: mealie
        - name: DB_ENGINE
          value: postgres
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DB_USER
              name: mealie
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DB_PASSWORD
              name: mealie
        - name: POSTGRES_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DB_HOST
              name: mealie
        - name: POSTGRES_PORT
          value: "5432"
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DB_DATABASE
              name: mealie
        image: ghcr.io/mealie-recipes/mealie:nightly
        name: mealie
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 300Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 150Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/data/
          name: data
      volumes:
      - name: data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mealie-pvc

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to production/Deployment/jobber-elastic:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: jobber-elastic
  namespace: production
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 10
  progressDeadlineSeconds: 600
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: jobber-elastic
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: jobber-elastic
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: discovery.type
          value: single-node
        - name: ES_JAVA_OPTS
          value: -Xmx1g -Xms1g
        - name: bootstrap.memory_lock
          value: "true"
        - name: xpack.security.enabled
          value: "true"
        - name: xpack.security.http.ssl.enabled
          value: "false"
        - name: xpack.security.transport.ssl.enabled
          value: "false"
        - name: xpack.security.authc.api_key.enabled
          value: "true"
        - name: xpack.monitoring.collection.enabled
          value: "true"
        - name: xpack.security.enrollment.enabled
          value: "true"
        - name: xpack.security.authc.token.enabled
          value: "true"
        - name: ELASTIC_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: jobber-elasticsearch-password
              name: jobber-backend-secret
        image: docker.elastic.co/elasticsearch/elasticsearch:8.15.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: jobber-elastic
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
          name: jobber-elastic
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1500m
            memory: 5Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 5Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: elasticsearch-local-storage
          subPath: data
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - chown -R 1000:1000 /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
        image: busybox
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: busybox
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/elasticsearch/data
          name: elasticsearch-local-storage
      volumes:
      - name: elasticsearch-local-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: elasticsearch-pvc

---

##### FILE: deployment1417.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to production/Deployment/jobber-mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: jobber-mysql
  namespace: production
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: jobber-mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: jobber-mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: api
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          value: api
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: jobber_auth
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: jobber
        image: mysql:8.0.35
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - bash
            - -c
            - |
              mysqladmin -u$MYSQL_USER -p$MYSQL_PASSWORD ping
          initialDelaySeconds: 120
          periodSeconds: 300
          timeoutSeconds: 60
        name: jobber-mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: jobber-mysql
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - bash
            - -c
            - |
              mysql -h127.0.0.1 -u$MYSQL_USER -p$MYSQL_PASSWORD -e'SELECT 1'
          initialDelaySeconds: 120
          periodSeconds: 300
          timeoutSeconds: 60
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 150Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-local-storage
          subPath: mysql
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-local-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mysql-pvc

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to production/Deployment/jobber-postgres:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: jobber-postgres
  namespace: production
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: jobber-postgres
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: jobber-postgres
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          value: jobber
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          value: api
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          value: jobber_reviews
        - name: PGDATA
          value: /var/lib/postgresql/data/pgdata
        image: postgres:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - psql
            - -w
            - -U
            - jobber
            - -d
            - jobber_reviews
            - -c
            - SELECT 1
          initialDelaySeconds: 120
          periodSeconds: 300
          timeoutSeconds: 60
        name: jobber-postgres
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
          name: jobber-postgres
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - psql
            - -w
            - -U
            - jobber
            - -d
            - jobber_reviews
            - -c
            - SELECT 1
          initialDelaySeconds: 120
          periodSeconds: 300
          timeoutSeconds: 60
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 150Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: postgres-local-storage
          subPath: postgres
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - name: postgres-local-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: postgres-pvc

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Deployment/kube-state-metrics:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: exporter
    app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 2.10.0
  name: kube-state-metrics
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: exporter
        app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 2.10.0
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      containers:
      - image: registry.k8s.io/kube-state-metrics/kube-state-metrics:v2.10.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: kube-state-metrics
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http-metrics
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: telemetry
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 65534
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: kube-state-metrics

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: hello-world
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hello-world
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: hello-world
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginxdemos/hello
        name: hello-world
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: hello-world
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 384Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 128Mi

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.72.0
  name: prometheus-operator
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
      app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-operator
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: prometheus-operator
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
        app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-operator
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.72.0
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      containers:
      - args:
        - --kubelet-service=kube-system/kubelet
        - --prometheus-config-reloader=quay.io/prometheus-operator/prometheus-config-reloader:v0.72.0
        env:
        - name: GOGC
          value: "30"
        image: quay.io/prometheus-operator/prometheus-operator:v0.72.0
        name: prometheus-operator
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 65534
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: prometheus-operator

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to projectname/Deployment/projectname:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: projectname
  name: projectname
  namespace: projectname
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 5
  replicas: 3
  revisionHistoryLimit: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: projectname
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: projectname
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: app
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - projectname
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 100
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: projectname-config
        image: ghcr.io/lighttecnologia/cartoriosmaranhao-new/central:develop
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 15
          tcpSocket:
            port: 80
          timeoutSeconds: 30
        name: app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          tcpSocket:
            port: 80
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/www/storage
          name: vultr-volume
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: dockerconfigjson-github-com
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - /bin/bash
        - -c
        - (php /var/www/html/artisan config:cache || true) && (php /var/www/html/artisan
          view:clear || true) && (php /var/www/html/artisan migrate --force || true)
        env:
        - name: ENABLE_PHPFPM
          value: "false"
        - name: ENABLE_NGINX
          value: "false"
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: projectname-config
        image: ghcr.io/lighttecnologia/cartoriosmaranhao-new/central:develop
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: artisan
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/www/storage
          name: vultr-volume
      volumes:
      - name: vultr-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: projectname-pvc

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ${NAMESPACE}/Deployment/grafana:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: grafana
  namespace: ${NAMESPACE}
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: grafana
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: grafana
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: docker.io/xygao/kubebpfbox-grafana:9.5.12
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: 3000
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: grafana
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: http-grafana
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /robots.txt
            port: 3000
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 30
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 2
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 2Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 50Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/grafana
          name: data
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana
          name: grafana-config
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/provisioning/datasources
          name: grafana-datasource
        - mountPath: /etc/grafana/provisioning/dashboards
          name: grafana-provisioning-dashboards
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 472
        supplementalGroups:
        - 0
      volumes:
      - name: data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: data-grafana
      - configMap:
          name: grafana-config
        name: grafana-config
      - configMap:
          name: grafana-datasource
        name: grafana-datasource
      - configMap:
          name: grafana-provisioning-dashboards-config
        name: grafana-provisioning-dashboards

kind: Deployment

    changeCause: |
      "changing to latest nginx version"
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 2
      maxUnavailable: 2
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

##### FILE: deployment1464.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to python-demo/Deployment/postgres:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: postgres
  namespace: python-demo
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: postgres
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: postgres
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          value: your_database_name
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          value: your_username
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: postgres-password
              name: postgres-secret
        image: postgres:latest
        name: postgres
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: postgres
      volumes:
      - name: postgres
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: api-postgres

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: fastapi-app
  namespace: python-demo
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: fastapi-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: fastapi-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_HOST
          value: postgres
        - name: DB_DATABASE
          value: your_database_name
        - name: DB_USERNAME
          value: your_username
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: postgres-password
              name: postgres-secret
        - name: DATABASE_URL
          value: postgresql://${DB_DATABASE}:${DB_PASSWORD}@postgres:5432/${DB_DATABASE}
        image: namhn89/fastapi:{tag}
        name: fastapi-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000

##### FILE: deployment1466.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/currency-exchange:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: currency-exchange
  name: currency-exchange
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 45
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: currency-exchange
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: currency-exchange
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: in28min/currency-exchange-devops
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: liveness-port
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: currency-exchange
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: liveness-port
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: liveness-port
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1024Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 512Mi
      restartPolicy: Always
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/langfuse-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: langfuse-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: langfuse-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: langfuse-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NODE_ENV
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: langfuse-node-env
              name: langfuse-configmap
        - name: DATABASE_URL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: langfuse-db-url
              name: langfuse-secrets
        - name: NEXTAUTH_URL
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: langfuse-nextauth-url
              name: langfuse-configmap
        - name: NEXTAUTH_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: langfuse-nextauth-secret
              name: langfuse-secrets
        - name: SALT
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: langfuse-salt
              name: langfuse-secrets
        - name: TELEMETRY_ENABLED
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: langfuse-telemetry-enabled
              name: langfuse-configmap
        - name: NEXT_PUBLIC_SIGN_UP_DISABLED
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: langfuse-next-public-sign-up-disabled
              name: langfuse-configmap
        - name: LANGFUSE_ENABLE_EXPERIMENTAL_FEATURES
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: langfuse-enable-experimentalfeatures
              name: langfuse-configmap
        image: ghcr.io/langfuse/langfuse:latest
        name: langfuse
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "2"
            memory: 1Gi

apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app: doc-controller
    app.kubernetes.io/name: doc-controller
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.12.11
  name: doc-controller
  namespace: default
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 443
      protocol: TCP
    - port: 6443
      protocol: TCP
    to:
    - ipBlock:
        cidr: 0.0.0.0/0
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          k8s-app: kube-dns
  ingress:
  - from:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: monitoring
      podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: prometheus
    ports:
    - port: http
      protocol: TCP
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app: doc-controller

  - Egress

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/doc-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: doc-controller
    app.kubernetes.io/name: doc-controller
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 0.12.11
  name: doc-controller
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: doc-controller
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: doc-controller
      labels:
        app: doc-controller
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: RUST_LOG
          value: info,kube=debug,controller=debug
        image: clux/controller:0.12.11
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: doc-controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: http
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext: {}
      securityContext: {}
      serviceAccountName: doc-controller

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app_name: <OPENVPN_APP_NAME>
  name: <OPENVPN_APP_NAME>
  namespace: <NAMESPACE_NAME>
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app_name: <OPENVPN_APP_NAME>
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app_name: <OPENVPN_APP_NAME>
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: $secrets.REGISTRY_URL/<OPENVPN_APP_NAME>:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: <OPENVPN_APP_NAME>
        ports:
        - containerPort: 1194
          protocol: TCP
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_ADMIN
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/openvpn
          name: openvpn-volume
          subPath: registry
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - sysctl -w net.ipv4.ip_forward=1
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        image: busybox:latest
        name: enable-ip-forward
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
      volumes:
      - name: openvpn-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: openvpn-pvc

---

          name: log-volume

          name: dashboard-configmap
        name: config-volume

##### FILE: deployment1480.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/stremio-service:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: stremio
    role: server
  name: stremio-service
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: stremio
      role: server
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: stremio
        role: server
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TZ
          value: Europe/Paris
        - name: VPN_SERVICE_PROVIDER
          value: custom
        - name: OPENVPN_CUSTOM_CONFIG
          value: /gluetun/custom.conf
        - name: OPENVPN_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: openvpn-credentials
        - name: OPENVPN_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: openvpn-credentials
        image: ghcr.io/qdm12/gluetun
        name: gluetun
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_ADMIN
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /gluetun/custom.conf
          name: openvpn-configuration
          readOnly: true
          subPath: custom.conf
      - image: ghcr.io/rpersee/stremio/server:4.20.3
        name: stremio-service
        ports:
        - containerPort: 11470
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /bin/sh
            - -c
            - |
              awk 'BEGIN {rc=1} $1 == "tun0" && $2 == "00000000" {rc=0} END {exit rc}' /proc/net/route
          failureThreshold: 1
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 30
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
      volumes:
      - name: openvpn-configuration
        secret:
          items:
          - key: custom.ovpn
            path: custom.conf
          secretName: openvpn-configuration

---

            memory: 128Mi

        name: app-config-vol

##### FILE: deployment1489.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/goserver:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: goserver
  name: goserver
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: goserver
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: goserver
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: goserver-env
        - secretRef:
            name: goserver-secret
        image: tayssve/hello-go:v4
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8000
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
        name: goserver
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8000
          periodSeconds: 3
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 25Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 25Mi
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 30
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8000
          periodSeconds: 3
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /go/myfamily
          name: configmap-volume
        - mountPath: /go/app
          name: goserver-volume
      volumes:
      - name: goserver-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: goserver-pvc
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: members
            path: family.txt
          name: configmap-family
        name: configmap-volume

---

        value: amd64

##### FILE: deployment1494.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/postgres-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: postgres-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: postgres
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: postgres
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          value: log
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          value: admin
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          value: password
        image: postgres:latest
        name: postgres
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: postgres-storage
      volumes:
      - name: postgres-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: postgres-pvc
      - configMap:
          name: postgres-init-script
        name: init-script

##### FILE: deployment15.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/k8s-status-badge:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: k8s-status-badge
  name: k8s-status-badge
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: k8s-status-badge
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: k8s-status-badge
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: k8s-status-badge-conf
        image: k8s-status-badge
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
      serviceAccountName: k8s-status-badge

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: hello
  name: hello
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: hello
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: hello
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - echo Hello from my container! && sleep 3600
        image: busybox
        name: hello-container

##### FILE: deployment152.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/pi-web:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    kubernetes.courselabs.co: troubleshooting
  name: pi-web
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: pi-web
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: pi-web
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - dotnet
        - Pi.Web.dll
        - -m
        - web
        image: kiamol/ch05-pi
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          periodSeconds: 30
        name: web
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        readinessProbe:
          periodSeconds: 5
          tcpSocket:
            port: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 1Gi

---

        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP

        name: pod-info-container

##### FILE: deployment1527.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/miniport-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: miniport-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: miniport
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: miniport
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: corletey/miniport-website:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: miniport-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10

---

##### FILE: deployment1530.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/my-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    name: my-deployment
  name: my-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      server: nginx
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        server: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: nginx-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
      - args:
        - sleep 300
        command:
        - /bin/bash
        - -c
        image: ubuntu:latest
        name: server
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500Mi
            memory: 500Mi

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Deployment/kube-state-metrics:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
    app.kubernetes.io/version: v1.8.0
  name: kube-state-metrics
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
        app.kubernetes.io/version: v1.8.0
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: quay.io/coreos/kube-state-metrics:v1.8.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: kube-state-metrics
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http-metrics
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: telemetry
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: kube-state-metrics

---

##### FILE: deployment1534.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "9113"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf
          name: nginx-config
          subPath: nginx.conf
      - args:
        - -nginx.scrape-uri=http://localhost/metrics
        image: nginx/nginx-prometheus-exporter:0.11.0
        name: nginx-exporter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9113
          name: metrics
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 0.3
            memory: 128Mi
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: nginx-config
        name: nginx-config

---

##### FILE: deployment1536.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/goserver:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: goserver
  name: goserver
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: goserver
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: goserver
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: goserver-env
        image: wesleywillians/hello-go:v9.6
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8000
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: goserver
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8000
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 3
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.05"
            memory: 25Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.05"
            memory: 20Mi
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 30
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8000
          periodSeconds: 3
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /go/myfamily
          name: config
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /go/pvc
          name: goserver-volume
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: members
            path: family.txt
          name: configmap-family
        name: config
      - name: goserver-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: goserver-pvc

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/webapp:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: webapp-deployment
  name: webapp
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: webapp
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: webapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: 80
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: webapp
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: webapp
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 2
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: localtime
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /usr/share/zoneinfo/Asia/Shanghai
        name: localtime

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to development/Deployment/pod-info-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: pod-info
  name: pod-info-deployment
  namespace: development
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: pod-info
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: pod-info
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        image: kimschles/pod-info-app:latest
        name: pod-info-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 64Mi

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/logging-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: logging-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: logging
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: logging
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MessageBus__Host
          value: rabbitmq-cluster
        - name: MessageBus__Exchange
          value: sharcom
        - name: ConnectionStrings__LoggingDatabase
          value: Data Source=sharcommsdb.c80y6kdyckyj.eu-central-1.rds.amazonaws.com,1433;Database=Logging-database;Application
            Name=Logging-service;Integrated Security=false;User ID=admin;Password=letmeinnow;TrustServerCertificate=True;
        image: 031436274967.dkr.ecr.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/sharcom-logging:latest
        name: logging
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5001
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /Health
            port: 5001
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 400m
          requests:
            cpu: 200m

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/tenant-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: tenant-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: tenant
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: tenant
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MessageBus__Host
          value: rabbitmq-cluster
        - name: MessageBus__Exchange
          value: sharcom
        - name: ConnectionStrings__TenantDatabase
          value: Data Source=sharcommsdb.c80y6kdyckyj.eu-central-1.rds.amazonaws.com,1433;Database=Tenant-database;Application
            Name=Tenant-service;Integrated Security=false;User ID=admin;Password=letmeinnow;TrustServerCertificate=True;
        - name: Auth0__Domain
          value: sharcom.eu.auth0.com
        - name: Auth0__Audience
          value: https://sharcom.eu.auth0.com/api/v2/
        - name: Auth0__ManagementAPI__ClientID
          value: jEapMJEYPYB39DOo6adM824to3HoKNNQ
        - name: Auth0__ManagementAPI__ClientSecret
          value: HenjZSeMMwiL0yXNPSD589KLzpac1-TvK1_Cm1k7T07ReV3AVVbmjxgOItcdsQOC
        image: 031436274967.dkr.ecr.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/sharcom-tenant:latest
        name: tenant
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5002
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /Health
            port: 5002
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 400m
          requests:
            cpu: 200m

##### FILE: deployment1552.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/spinnaker-operator:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: spinnaker-operator
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: spinnaker-operator
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: spinnaker-operator
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --disable-admission-controller
        command:
        - spinnaker-operator
        env:
        - name: WATCH_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: OPERATOR_NAME
          value: spinnaker-operator
        image: armory/spinnaker-operator:dev
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: spinnaker-operator
      - image: armory/halyard:operator-dev
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 20
          tcpSocket:
            port: 8064
        name: halyard
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8064
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 20
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8064
          initialDelaySeconds: 20
          periodSeconds: 5
      serviceAccountName: spinnaker-operator

---

kind: Deployment

      name: spinnaker-operator

    metadata:
      labels:
        name: spinnaker-operator

      - command:
        - spinnaker-operator

          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: OPERATOR_NAME
          value: spinnaker-operator

        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: spinnaker-operator
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9876
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
      - image: armory/halyard:operator-dev
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 20
          tcpSocket:
            port: 8064
        name: halyard

        - containerPort: 8064
          name: http
          protocol: TCP

      app: minikube-sample

    metadata:

    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: env.namespace
          value: default
        image: minikube-sample:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: minikube-sample
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: config

      - configMap:

        name: config

##### FILE: deployment1557.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: api
  name: api
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: api
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        io.kompose.service: api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MSSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mssql-password
              name: mssql-password
        - name: ConnectionStrings__DefaultConnection
          value: Server=tcp:mssql,1433;Initial Catalog=RabbitMqDemo;Persist Security
            Info=False;User ID=sa;Password=$(MSSQL_PASSWORD);Connection Timeout=30;
        - name: RabbitMQ__Hostname
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: rabbitmq_hostname
              name: api
        - name: RabbitMQ__Password
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: rabbit-password
              name: rabbit-password
        - name: RabbitMQ__Username
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: rabbit-username
              name: rabbit-username
        image: matthieuf/pubsub-api:1.2
        name: api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
      restartPolicy: Always

---

              key: rabbit-password

          valueFrom:

              key: rabbit-username
              name: rabbit-username
