##### FILE: deployment1559_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mssql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: mssql
  name: mssql
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: mssql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        io.kompose.service: mssql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MSSQL_PID
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: mssql_pid
              name: mssql
        - name: ACCEPT_EULA
          value: true
        - name: MSSQL_SA_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mssql-password
              name: mssql-password
        image: mcr.microsoft.com/mssql/server:2022-latest
        name: lab-mssql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 1433
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/opt/mssql
          name: mssqldb
      restartPolicy: Always
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 10001
      volumes:
      - name: mssqldb
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mssql-data

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment

  name: team-red-app

        app.kubernetes.io/name: team-red-app
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.0.0
      name: team-red-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: team-red-cm
        image: mendhak/http-https-echo:29
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 2
          httpGet:
            path: /status
            port: 8080
          periodSeconds: 30
          successThreshold: 1
        name: echoserver
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 2
          httpGet:
            path: /status
            port: 8080
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 50Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 30
          httpGet:
            path: /status
            port: 8080
          periodSeconds: 2
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30

---

          value: /var/backup

          name: nfs-client-root
      serviceAccountName: nfs-client-provisioner
      volumes:
      - name: nfs-client-root
        nfs:
          path: /var/backup
          server: <<NFS Server IP>>

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to vertx/Deployment/customer-vertx-service:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: customer-vertx-service
  namespace: vertx
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: customer-vertx-service
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: customer-vertx-service
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database-name
              name: mongodb
        - name: MONGO_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: database-user
              name: mongodb
        - name: MONGO_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: database-password
              name: mongodb
        - name: MONGO_URL
          value: mongodb
        image: customer-vertx-service
        name: customer-vertx-service
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    group: example
  name: second-app-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: second-app
      tier: backend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: second-app
        tier: backend
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: partorg/kub-first-app:2
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: second-node

      app: story
  template:

        app: story

          valueFrom:

              key: folder
              name: data-store-env
        image: partorg/kub-data-demo:3
        name: story
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/story
          name: story-volume
      volumes:
      - name: story-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: host-pvc

##### FILE: deployment157.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/example-deploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations: null
  labels:
    app: example-app
  name: example-deploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: example-app
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: example-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: aimvector/python:1.0.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: example-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 64Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /secrets/
          name: secret-volume
        - mountPath: /configs/
          name: config-volume
      volumes:
      - name: secret-volume
        secret:
          secretName: mysecret
      - configMap:
          name: example-config
        name: config-volume

---

##### FILE: deployment158.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/example-deploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations: null
  labels:
    app: example-app
  name: example-deploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: example-app
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: example-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: aimvector/deno-app:v1
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: example-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 64Mi

---

      app: second-app
      tier: backend

    metadata:

        app: second-app
        tier: backend

      containers:
      - image: asyrul21/kub-first-app:2
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 3
        name: second-node

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/story-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: story-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: story-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: story-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: STORY_FOLDER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: folder
              name: data-store-env
        image: asyrul21/kub-volumes-demo:2
        name: story
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/story
          name: story-volume
      volumes:
      - name: story-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: host-pvc

---

  name: minikube-sample
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: minikube-sample
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: minikube-sample
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: env.namespace
          value: default
        image: minikube-sample:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: minikube-sample
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: config
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: minikube-sample
        name: config

##### FILE: deployment1587.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nfs-client-provisioner:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nfs-client-provisioner
  name: nfs-client-provisioner
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nfs-client-provisioner
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nfs-client-provisioner
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PROVISIONER_NAME
          value: k8s-sigs.io/nfs-subdir-external-provisioner
        - name: NFS_SERVER
          value: <YOUR_NFS_SERVER_HOSTNAME>
        - name: NFS_PATH
          value: <YOUR_NFS_PATH>
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/nfs-subdir-external-provisioner:v4.0.2
        name: nfs-client-provisioner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /persistentvolumes
          name: nfs-client-root
      serviceAccountName: nfs-client-provisioner
      volumes:
      - name: nfs-client-root
        nfs:
          path: <YOUR_NFS_PATH>
          server: <YOUR_NFS_SERVER_HOSTNAME>

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: deployment1588.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/currency-exchange:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: currency-exchange
  name: currency-exchange
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 45
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: currency-exchange
  strategy:

##### FILE: deployment162_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/example-webhook:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: example-webhook
  name: example-webhook
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: example-webhook
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: example-webhook
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: aimvector/example-webhook:v1
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: tls
        - containerPort: 80
          name: metrics
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/webhook/certs/
          name: webhook-tls-certs
          readOnly: true
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 1234
      serviceAccountName: example-webhook
      volumes:
      - name: webhook-tls-certs
        secret:
          secretName: example-webhook-tls

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/okd-in-use-nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: okd-in-use-nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: okd-in-use-nginx-app
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: okd-in-use-nginx-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginxinc/nginx-unprivileged:latest
        name: nginx-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 20m
            ephemeral-storage: 30Mi
            memory: 25Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 6m
            ephemeral-storage: 10Mi
            memory: 25Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/log/nginx
          name: log
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: nginx.conf
            path: nginx.conf
          - key: virtualhost.conf
            path: virtualhost/virtualhost.conf
          name: okd-in-use-nginx-conf
        name: nginx-conf
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: log

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: okd-in-use-project-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: okd-in-use-project-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: okd-in-use-project-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: HTTP_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: default.port
              name: okd-in-use-project-config
        image: amirhossein21/okd-in-use-project:v0.1.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 9091
        name: app-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9091
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 9091
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 20m
            ephemeral-storage: 30Mi
            memory: 25Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 6m
            ephemeral-storage: 10Mi
            memory: 25Mi

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: application-cpu
  name: application-cpu
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: application-cpu
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: application-cpu
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: aimvector/application-cpu:v1.0.2
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: application-cpu
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 2000m
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 50Mi

      role: api

    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        role: api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_CONN_STR
          value: mongodb://mongodb-svc:27017/todo?directConnection=true
        - name: MONGO_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongo-sec
        - name: MONGO_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongo-sec
        image: 407622020962.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/backend:1
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 3500
          initialDelaySeconds: 2
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3500
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ready
            port: 3500
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 30
          httpGet:
            path: /started
            port: 3500
          initialDelaySeconds: 0
          periodSeconds: 10
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: ecr-registry-secret

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to three-tier/Deployment/mongodb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mongodb
  namespace: three-tier
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mongodb
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - numactl
        - --interleave=all
        - mongod
        - --wiredTigerCacheSizeGB
        - "0.1"
        - --bind_ip
        - 0.0.0.0
        env:
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongo-sec
        - name: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongo-sec
        image: mongo:4.4.6
        name: mon
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-volume
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-volume-claim

---

            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 5

          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi

##### FILE: deployment169.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/Deployment/nginx-ingress-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-ingress-controller
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-ingress
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "10254"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: nginx-ingress
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - /nginx-ingress-controller
        - --configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/nginx-configuration
        - --tcp-services-configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/tcp-services
        - --udp-services-configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/udp-services
        - --publish-service=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/ingress-nginx
        - --annotations-prefix=nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: quay.io/kubernetes-ingress-controller/nginx-ingress-controller:0.25.1
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        name: nginx-ingress-controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        - containerPort: 443
          name: https
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            drop:
            - ALL
          runAsUser: 33
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/custom-snippets/
          name: custom-snippets
      serviceAccountName: nginx-ingress-serviceaccount
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: custom-snippets
        name: custom-snippets

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: product
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: product
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: product
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_HOST
          value: pgsql
        - name: POSTGRES_PORT
          value: "5432"
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          value: ann
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          value: ann
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
              name: pgsql
        - name: GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS
          value: /var/secrets/google/key.json
        image: asia-east1-docker.pkg.dev/ikala-cloud-swe-dev-sandbox/ann-test/product:v30
        name: product
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 10Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 5Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/secrets/google
          name: google-cloud-key
        - mountPath: /cache
          name: csv-volume
      volumes:
      - name: google-cloud-key
        secret:
          secretName: pubsub-key
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: csv-volume

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/backstage:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: backstage
  name: backstage
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: backstage
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: backstage
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config
        - app-config.tilt.yaml
        command:
        - node
        - packages/backend
        env:
        - name: APP_CONFIG_backend_listen_port
          value: "7007"
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: backstage-secret
        image: backstage
        name: backstage
        ports:
        - containerPort: 7007
          name: backend
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: frontend
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "2"
            memory: 2048Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 256Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/app-config.tilt.yaml
          name: backstage-config
          subPath: app-config.tilt.yaml
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: backstage-config
        name: backstage-config

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations: null
  labels:
    app: example-app
  name: example-deploy
  namespace: example
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: example-app
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: example-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: aimvector/python:1.0.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: example-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /configs/
          name: config-volume
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: example-config
        name: config-volume

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to test/Deployment/nginx-test:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-test
  namespace: test
spec:
  replicas: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-test
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-test
      name: hello
      namespace: test
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: disk
                operator: In
                values:
                - fast
                - slow
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: hello
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http

---

            memory: 64Mi

##### FILE: deployment173.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/Deployment/nginx-ingress-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-ingress-controller
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-ingress
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "10254"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: nginx-ingress
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - /nginx-ingress-controller
        - --configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/nginx-configuration
        - --tcp-services-configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/tcp-services
        - --udp-services-configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/udp-services
        - --publish-service=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/ingress-nginx
        - --annotations-prefix=nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: quay.io/kubernetes-ingress-controller/nginx-ingress-controller:0.25.1
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        name: nginx-ingress-controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        - containerPort: 443
          name: https
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 10
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            drop:
            - ALL
          runAsUser: 33
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/custom-snippets/
          name: custom-snippets
      serviceAccountName: nginx-ingress-serviceaccount
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: custom-snippets
        name: custom-snippets

---

##### FILE: deployment1739.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/kube-state-metrics:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
    app.kubernetes.io/version: v1.8.0
    k8s-app: kube-state-metrics
  name: kube-state-metrics
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: kube-state-metrics
        app.kubernetes.io/version: v1.8.0
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: quay.io/coreos/kube-state-metrics:v1.8.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: kube-state-metrics
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http-metrics
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: telemetry
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 5
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: kube-state-metrics

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: example-app
  name: example-deploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: example-app
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: example-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: aimvector/python:metrics
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: example-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.33.0
  name: prometheus-operator
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
      app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-operator
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
        app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-operator
        app.kubernetes.io/version: v0.33.0
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --kubelet-service=kube-system/kubelet
        - --logtostderr=true
        - --config-reloader-image=quay.io/coreos/configmap-reload:v0.0.1
        - --prometheus-config-reloader=quay.io/coreos/prometheus-config-reloader:v0.33.0
        image: quay.io/coreos/prometheus-operator:v0.33.0
        name: prometheus-operator
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      nodeSelector:
        beta.kubernetes.io/os: linux
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 65534
      serviceAccountName: prometheus-operator

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/Deployment/kube-state-metrics:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: kube-state-metrics
  name: kube-state-metrics
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: kube-state-metrics
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: kube-state-metrics
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --logtostderr
        - --secure-listen-address=:8443
        - --tls-cipher-suites=TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA256
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8081/
        image: quay.io/coreos/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.4.1
        name: kube-rbac-proxy-main
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: https-main
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 40Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 20Mi
      - args:
        - --logtostderr
        - --secure-listen-address=:9443
        - --tls-cipher-suites=TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA256
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:8082/
        image: quay.io/coreos/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.4.1
        name: kube-rbac-proxy-self
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9443
          name: https-self
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 40Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 20Mi
      - args:
        - --host=127.0.0.1
        - --port=8081
        - --telemetry-host=127.0.0.1
        - --telemetry-port=8082
        image: quay.io/coreos/kube-state-metrics:v1.8.0
        name: kube-state-metrics
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 150Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 150Mi
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 65534
      serviceAccountName: kube-state-metrics

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nodeapp
  name: nodeapp
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nodeapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nodeapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_HOST
              name: config
        - name: DB_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_PORT
              name: config
        - name: DB_USER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_USER
              name: config
        image: ujinslav/nodeapp
        name: nodeserver
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/data
          name: logs-storage
      volumes:
      - name: logs-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: claim

    app.kubernetes.io/instance: traefik-traefik
    app.kubernetes.io/name: traefik
  name: traefik
  namespace: traefik
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 0
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: traefik-traefik
      app.kubernetes.io/name: traefik
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        prometheus.io/path: /metrics
        prometheus.io/port: "9100"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: traefik-traefik
        app.kubernetes.io/name: traefik
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      containers:
      - args:
        - --entryPoints.metrics.address=:9100/tcp
        - --entryPoints.traefik.address=:8080/tcp
        - --entryPoints.web.address=:8000/tcp
        - --entryPoints.websecure.address=:8443/tcp
        - --api.dashboard=true
        - --ping=true
        - --metrics.prometheus=true
        - --metrics.prometheus.entrypoint=metrics
        - --providers.kubernetescrd
        - --providers.kubernetescrd.allowEmptyServices=true
        - --providers.kubernetesingress
        - --providers.kubernetesingress.allowEmptyServices=true
        - --providers.kubernetesingress.ingressendpoint.publishedservice=traefik/traefik
        - --entryPoints.web.http.redirections.entryPoint.to=:443
        - --entryPoints.web.http.redirections.entryPoint.scheme=https
        - --entryPoints.web.http.redirections.entryPoint.permanent=true
        - --entryPoints.websecure.http.tls=true
        - --entryPoints.websecure.http.tls.certResolver=letsencrypt
        - --log.level=INFO
        - --certificatesresolvers.letsencrypt.acme.dnsChallenge.provider=cloudflare
        - --certificatesresolvers.letsencrypt.acme.dnsChallenge.resolvers=anirban.ns.cloudflare.com:53,chin.ns.cloudflare.com:53
        - --certificatesresolvers.letsencrypt.acme.email=acme@codedbearder.com
        - --certificatesresolvers.letsencrypt.acme.storage=/data/acme.json
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: acme-creds
        image: docker.io/traefik:v3.3.4
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /ping
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 2
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 2
        name: traefik
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9100
          name: metrics
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: traefik
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: web
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: websecure
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /ping
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 2
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 2
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: data
          subPath: traefik
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: tmp
      hostNetwork: false
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - touch /data/acme.json; chmod -v 600 /data/acme.json
        image: busybox:1.36
        name: volume-permissions
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: data
          subPath: traefik
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 2000
        fsGroupChangePolicy: OnRootMismatch
        runAsGroup: 65532
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 65532
      serviceAccountName: traefik
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 60
      volumes:
      - name: data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: traefik
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: tmp

---

##### FILE: deployment-updated_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.7.9
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

---

##### FILE: deployment-users.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/users-api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: microservice-app-example
  name: users-api
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: microservice-app-example
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: microservice-app-example
        service: users-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: JWT_SECRET
          value: myfancysecret
        - name: SERVER_PORT
          value: "8083"
        - name: SPRING_ZIPKIN_BASE_URL
          value: http://zipkin:9411
        image: sa93/users-api:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: users-api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8083
      restartPolicy: Always

---

##### FILE: deployment-using-affinity.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/gotohell:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: gotohell
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      run: gotohell
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        run: gotohell
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchLabels:
                run: gotohell
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - image: ghanshyamit100/webserver:v2
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - cat
            - /var/www/html/index.html
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 20
          timeoutSeconds: 3
        name: gotohell
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http

##### FILE: deployment-using-affinity1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/gotohell:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: gotohell
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      run: gotohell
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        run: gotohell
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchLabels:
                run: gotohell
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - image: lovelearnlinux/webserver:v2
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - cat
            - /var/www/html/index.html
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 20
          timeoutSeconds: 3
        name: gotohell
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
          protocol: TCP

---

##### FILE: deployment-using-pvc.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/webapp:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: webapp
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: lovelearnlinux/webserver:v1
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/www/html
          name: webroot
      volumes:
      - name: webroot
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: myclaim

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/myapp:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: myapp
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: myapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: myapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: myapp:0.1.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: myapp
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 64Mi

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx-deployment
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-deployment
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.25"
            memory: 128Mi

##### FILE: deployment-vault1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/test-deployment-vault:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: test-deployment-vault
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: test-deployment-vault
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        secrets-webhook.security.bank-vaults.io/provider: vault
        secrets-webhook.security.bank-vaults.io/vault-addr: https://vault.default.svc.cluster.local:8200
        secrets-webhook.security.bank-vaults.io/vault-path: kubernetes
        secrets-webhook.security.bank-vaults.io/vault-role: default
        secrets-webhook.security.bank-vaults.io/vault-tls-secret: vault-tls
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: test-deployment-vault
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - echo AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=$AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY && echo going to sleep...
          && sleep 10000
        env:
        - name: AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY
          value: vault:secret/data/accounts/aws#AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY
        image: alpine
        name: alpine
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
      - env:
        - name: AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY
          value: vault:secret/data/accounts/aws#AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY
        image: redis
        name: redis
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - echo AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=$AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY && echo initContainers
          ready
        env:
        - name: AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY
          value: vault:secret/data/accounts/aws#${.AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY}
        image: ubuntu
        name: init-ubuntu
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: deployment-version-1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/goserver:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: goserver
  name: goserver
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: goserver
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: goserver
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: goserver-env
        - secretRef:
            name: goserver-secret
        image: wesleywillians/hello-go:v5.2
        name: goserver
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /go/myfamily
          name: config
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: members
            path: family.txt
          name: configmap-family
        name: config

---

##### FILE: deployment-version-2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/goserver:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: goserver
  name: goserver
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: goserver
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: goserver
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: goserver-env
        - secretRef:
            name: goserver-secret
        image: wesleywillians/hello-go:v5.3
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8000
          initialDelaySeconds: 1
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: goserver
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /go/myfamily
          name: config
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: members
            path: family.txt
          name: configmap-family
        name: config

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/goserver

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/goserver
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Deployment/goserver failed:

##### FILE: deployment-version-3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/goserver:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: goserver
  name: goserver
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: goserver
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: goserver
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: goserver-env
        - secretRef:
            name: goserver-secret
        image: wesleywillians/hello-go:v5.4
        name: goserver
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8000
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /go/myfamily
          name: config
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: members
            path: family.txt
          name: configmap-family
        name: config

---

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: goserver
  name: goserver
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: goserver
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: goserver
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: goserver-env
        - secretRef:
            name: goserver-secret
        image: wesleywillians/hello-go:v9.6
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8000
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1

        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8000
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1

          limits:
            cpu: "0.08"
            memory: 25Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.05"

##### FILE: Deployment-volume.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx
          name: nginx-vol
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: nginx-cm
        name: nginx-vol

---

##### FILE: Deployment-volume_(subPath).yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
          name: nginx-vol
          subPath: nginx.conf
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: nginx-cm
        name: nginx-vol

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: demo-voting-app
    name: voting-app-deploy
  name: voting-app-deploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: demo-voting-app
      name: voting-app-pod
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: demo-voting-app
        name: voting-app-pod
      name: voting-app-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: kodekloud/examplevotingapp_vote:v1
        name: voting-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 120m
            memory: 154Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi

##### FILE: deployment-web3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to mypypi/Deployment/mypypi-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mypypi-deployment
  namespace: mypypi
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mypypi
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mypypi
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYPYPI_BASE_URL
          value: https://pypi.nathanv.app
        - name: MYPYPI_REPOSITORIES
          value: '[{"slug": "pypi", "simple_url": "https://pypi.org/simple/", "cache_minutes":
            10, "timeout_seconds": 10}, {"slug": "pytorch", "simple_url": "https://download.pytorch.org/whl/",

##### FILE: deployment-webtrees.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to webtrees/Deployment/webtrees-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: webtrees-deployment
  namespace: webtrees
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: webtrees
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: webtrees
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: BASE_URL
          value: https://webtrees.nathanv.app
        - name: PRETTY_URLS
          value: "1"
        - name: DB_USER
          value: webtrees
        - name: DB_NAME
          value: webtrees
        - name: DB_HOST
          value: webtrees-mysql-service.webtrees.svc.cluster.local
        - name: DB_PORT
          value: "3306"
        - name: DB_TYPE
          value: mysql
        - name: DB_PREFIX
          value: wt_
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: webtrees-env
        image: cr.nathanv.app/ghcr.io/nathanvaughn/webtrees:2.2.1
        name: webtrees
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/www/webtrees/data/
          name: data-vol
        - mountPath: /var/www/webtrees/modules_v4/
          name: modules-vol
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - run
        - /tmp/modules.py
        command:
        - uv
        image: cr.nathanv.app/ghcr.io/astral-sh/uv:python3.13-alpine
        name: module-install
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/www/webtrees/modules_v4/
          name: modules-vol
        - mountPath: /tmp/modules.py
          name: modules-config-vol
          subPath: modules.py
        workingDir: /var/www/webtrees/
      nodeSelector:
        role: apps
      volumes:
      - name: data-vol
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: webtrees-pvc-data
      - name: modules-vol
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: webtrees-pvc-modules
      - configMap:
          name: webtrees-modules-config
        name: modules-config-vol

---

          value: https://webtrees-test.nathanv.app
        - name: PRETTY_URLS
          value: "1"
        - name: DB_USER
          value: webtrees
        - name: DB_NAME
          value: webtrees

          value: webtrees-test-mysql-service.webtrees-test.svc.cluster.local

          value: "3306"

          value: mysql
        - name: DB_PREFIX
          value: wt_

        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

          name: data-vol
        - mountPath: /var/www/webtrees/modules_v4/
          name: modules-vol

      - args:
        - run
        - /tmp/modules.py
        command:
        - uv
        image: cr.nathanv.app/ghcr.io/astral-sh/uv:python3.13-alpine
        name: module-install
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/www/webtrees/modules_v4/
          name: modules-vol
        - mountPath: /tmp/modules.py
          name: modules-config-vol
          subPath: modules.py
        workingDir: /var/www/webtrees/
      nodeSelector:
        role: apps
      volumes:
      - name: data-vol
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: webtrees-test-pvc-data
      - name: modules-vol
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: webtrees-test-pvc-modules

          name: webtrees-test-modules-config

##### FILE: deployment-with-configmap.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/my-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: my-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: my-app
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: my-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.12
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 100Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d/
          name: config
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: my-configmap
        name: config

---


Mutation:

            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10

          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 100Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d/
          name: config
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: my-configmap
        name: config

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/my-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: my-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: my-app
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: my-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.12
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 100Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d/
          name: config
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: my-configmap
        name: config

##### FILE: deployment-with-liveness.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/whoami:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    kubernetes.courselabs.co: productionizing
  name: whoami
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: whoami
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: whoami
        update: liveness
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: WHOAMI_MODE
          value: q
        image: sixeyed/whoami:21.04
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 80
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: app
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 80
          periodSeconds: 5

---

##### FILE: deployment-with-managed-fields.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/test:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    deployment.kubernetes.io/revision: "1"
  creationTimestamp: "2023-06-01T08:43:47Z"
  generation: 1
  managedFields:
  - apiVersion: apps/v1
    fieldsType: FieldsV1
    fieldsV1:
      f:spec:
        f:progressDeadlineSeconds: {}
        f:replicas: {}
        f:revisionHistoryLimit: {}
        f:selector: {}
        f:template:
          f:metadata:
            f:labels:
              f:app: {}
          f:spec:
            f:containers:
              k:{"name":"nginx"}:
                .: {}
                f:image: {}
                f:name: {}
                f:ports:
                  k:{"containerPort":80,"protocol":"TCP"}:
                    .: {}
                    f:containerPort: {}
    manager: controller
    operation: Apply
    time: "2023-06-01T08:43:47Z"
  name: test
  namespace: default
spec:
  progressDeadlineSeconds: 600
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: test-dependent
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: test-dependent
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.17.0
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

---

##### FILE: deployment-with-multiple-volumes.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/elastic:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: elastic
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: elastic
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: elastic
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: elastic:latest
        name: elastic-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9200
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/data
          name: es-persistent-storage
        - mountPath: /var/lib/secret
          name: es-secret-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/config
          name: es-config-dir
      volumes:
      - name: es-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: es-pv-claim
      - name: es-secret-dir
        secret:
          secretName: es-secret
      - configMap:
          name: es-config-map
        name: es-config-dir

---

##### FILE: deployment-with-namespace.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Deployment/helm-guestbook:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: helm-guestbook
  name: helm-guestbook
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  replicas: 0
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: helm-guestbook
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: helm-guestbook
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: quay.io/argoprojlabs/argocd-e2e-container:0.2
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: http
        name: helm-guestbook
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: http

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource kube-system/Deployment/helm-guestbook

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource kube-system/Deployment/helm-guestbook failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource kube-system/Deployment/helm-guestbook failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: helm-guestbook
  name: helm-guestbook
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  replicas: 0
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: helm-guestbook
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: helm-guestbook
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: quay.io/argoprojlabs/argocd-e2e-container:0.2
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: http
        name: helm-guestbook
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: http

##### FILE: deployment-with-otel-conf.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/todo-service:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: todo-service
  name: todo-service
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: todo-service
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        instrumentation.opentelemetry.io/inject-java: opentelemetry-operator-system/otel-instrumentation
      labels:
        app: todo-service
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE
          value: todo-service
        - name: GRPC_USER_ENABLED
          value: "true"
        - name: MYSQL_URL
          value: jdbc:mysql://mysql.todo-apps.svc.cluster.local:3306/tododb?createDatabaseIfNotExist=true
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: root
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          value: root
        image: todo-app
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: todo-service
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - until nslookup mysql.todo-apps.svc.cluster.local; do echo Waiting for MySQL
          ...; sleep 2; done;
        image: busybox
        name: init-mysql

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: deployment-with-otel-conf_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/user-service:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: user-service
  name: user-service
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: user-service
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        instrumentation.opentelemetry.io/inject-java: opentelemetry-operator-system/otel-instrumentation
      labels:
        app: user-service
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE
          value: user-service
        - name: MYSQL_URL
          value: jdbc:mysql://mysql.todo-apps.svc.cluster.local:3306/userdb?createDatabaseIfNotExist=true
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: root
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          value: root
        image: todo-app
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: user-service
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8085
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - until nslookup mysql.todo-apps.svc.cluster.local; do echo Waiting for MySQL
          ...; sleep 2; done;
        image: busybox
        name: init-mysql

##### FILE: deployment-with-otel-conf1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/blog-service:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: blog-service
  name: blog-service
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: blog-service
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        instrumentation.opentelemetry.io/inject-go: opentelemetry-operator-system/otel-instrumentation
        instrumentation.opentelemetry.io/otel-go-auto-target-exe: /app/src/blog-service/app
      labels:
        app: blog-service
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: APP_PATH
          value: blog-service
        - name: ANALYZER_URL
          value: http://text-analyze-svc:3000
        image: blog-app
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: blog-service
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - SYS_PTRACE
          privileged: true
          runAsUser: 0

---

##### FILE: deployment-with-persistence_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/my-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: my-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app-label: my-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app-label: my-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        startupProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - /bin/sh
            - -c
            - echo "$(hostname)</br>" >> /usr/share/nginx/html/index.html
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: deployment-volume
      volumes:
      - name: deployment-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: my-pvc

---

##### FILE: deployment-with-readiness.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/whoami:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    kubernetes.courselabs.co: productionizing
  name: whoami
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: whoami
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: whoami
        update: readiness
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: WHOAMI_MODE
          value: q
        image: sixeyed/whoami:21.04
        name: app
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 80
          periodSeconds: 5

---

metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx-deployment
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: giropops
spec:
  replicas: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-deployment
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.14.0
        name: nginx
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 0.6
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 0.3
            memory: 64Mi

---

      app:

##### FILE: deployment-with-stuff.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/my-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: my-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: my-app
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: my-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.12
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 10000m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10000m
            memory: 100Mi

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: deployment-with-unixuserid
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.7.9
        name: nginx
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 65534

##### FILE: deployment-wordpress.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/wordpress-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: wordpress-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: app-wordpress
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: app-wordpress
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: WORDPRESS_DB_HOST
          value: svc-mysql
        - name: WORDPRESS_DB_USER
          value: wordpress_user
        - name: WORDPRESS_DB_PASSWORD
          value: asdf1234
        - name: WORDPRESS_DB_NAME
          value: wordpress_db
        image: cristianchayanne/wordpress:v1
        name: wordpress
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/www/html
          name: persistent-storage-wordpress
      volumes:
      - name: persistent-storage-wordpress
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: pvc-wordpress

---

##### FILE: deployment-worker-app.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/worker-app-deploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: demo-voting-app
    name: worker-app-deploy
  name: worker-app-deploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: demo-voting-app
      name: worker-app-pod
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: demo-voting-app
        name: worker-app-pod
      name: worker-app-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_HOST_AUTH_METHOD
          value: trust
        image: kodekloud/examplevotingapp_worker:v1
        name: worker-app
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 120m
            memory: 154Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: microservice-app-example
  name: zipkin
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: microservice-app-example
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: microservice-app-example
        service: zipkin
    spec:
      containers:
      - env: null
        image: openzipkin/zipkin
        name: zipkin
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9411
      restartPolicy: Always

---
